text.title: Haldia
text.p:
Haldia
is a port and industrial city in
Southwest Bengal
in
India
.

p.s: Haldia is located near the confluence of the Hooghly River , a distributary of the Ganges and Haldi River .
Haldia Dock Complex , which is administratively a part of Kolkata Port Trust was commissioned in 1977 .
Haldia Refinery of Indian Oil Corporation was commissioned in 1975 .
Thereafter many industries cropped up in Haldia , including Haldia Petro-chemical complex .
